parameters.name: AllocateIpv4Addr
parameters.description: The IPv4 address allocated to the IPv6 Translation Service instance.

parameters.name: AllocateIpv6Addr
parameters.description: The IPv6 address allocated to the IPv6 Translation Service instance.

parameters.name: BusinessStatus
parameters.description:
The business status of the IPv6 Translation Service instance. Valid values:

*   **Normal**
*   **FinancialLocked**

parameters.name: Ipv6TranslatorId
parameters.description: The ID of the IPv6 Translation Service instance.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the IPv6 Translation Service instance.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: PayType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the IPv6 Translation Service instance. Valid values:

*   **Prepay**: subscription
*   **Postpay**: pay-as-you-go

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region of the IPv6 Translation Service instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: Spec
parameters.description: The specification of the IPv6 Translation Service instance. Set the value to **small**.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the IPv6 Translation Service instance. Valid values:

*   **init**
*   **provisioning**
*   **active**
*   **updating**
*   **upgrading**
*   **deleting**
*   **deleted**
